attributes.action: Make it clearer what the post coital pill does- it is abortion not contraception.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are not three established scientists in the UK who will agree that pregnancy begins after implantation rather than after fertilisation. Therefore the "morning after pill" is abortive and not contraceptive. It aborts the embryo rather than preventing conception. This is not made clear to women wanting the "morning after pill". Women have the right to know what this is doing to their bodies.
If doctors need to omit elements of the truth regarding this, I think we need to ask why that is. 
Give women the whole truth about this drug when the drug is requested in any of its forms.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
